recipe.title: Francesinha

preparation.step: Slice the sausages and season them with the salt and pepper, season the stake likewise. Grill both until the desired taste.
Toast the bread slices and add the meat in between. Cover the sandwich with the slices of cheese.
Preheat oven to 200 degrees C and leave the sandwich inside until the cheese melts.
Warm up the francesinha sauce and pour it on the sandwich.

recipe.comment: You can serve it with an fried egg on top
